summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to an unidentified recipient, discussing that an individual (likely a defendant or witness) was supposed to come to court to get counsel appointed, providing the individual's cell number, and attaching a subpoena dated August 15, 2019.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Author of the email, discussing court appointment of counsel and providing a subpoena.

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: A subpoena was issued, as indicated by the attached PDF file named '2019.08.15 Subpoena.pdf'.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

events.title: Scheduled Court Appearance for Counsel Appointment
events.description: An individual was supposed to come into court to get counsel appointed, as discussed in the email.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 21, 2019, from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
It references an individual who was supposed to come to court that day to get counsel appointed, and provides the individual's cell phone number (redacted in this summary).
A subpoena dated August 15, 2019, is attached to the email, indicating ongoing legal proceedings.
The correspondence suggests coordination between the prosecutor and another party (likely defense or other counsel) regarding a case involving the subpoenaed individual.
